titleStmt.title: Lucretius his six books of epicurean philosophy and Manilius his five books containing a system of the ancient astronomy and astrology together with The philosophy of the Stoicks / both translated into English verse with notes by Mr. Tho. Creech; To which is added the several parts of Lucretius, English'd by Mr. Dryden.
titleStmt.author: Lucretius Carus, Titus.
Manilius, Marcus. Five books of M. Manilius.
Creech, Thomas, 1659-1700.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Pages stained, with some loss of print.
Creech's translation of Lucretius has special t.p. with statement "Fifth edition".
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
